duties_responsibilities.duty: Research, identify and develop new coating processes and surface treatments for faucet products.
Lead development and implementation of new coating processes at internal plants and support at external global suppliers.
Commercially deploy new finishes at plants and suppliers.
Utilize statistical tools in all aspects of process development.
Coordinate and lead all areas of Operations to launch new finishes.
Lead project teams to achieve program Safety, Quality, Delivery, and Cost targets.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Materials Science/Engineering, Chemical or Thin Films Engineering (Advanced Degree in Engineering Preferred)
